[[inst_hl_bstart_std]]
==== HL.BSTART.STD

*Syntax:* HL.BSTART.STD CALL, <label>

*Description:* Block Start for STandard: marks entry point for standard execution block.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_bstart_std.svg[HL.BSTART.STD encoding,width=800]

*Group:* BBD/BSTART
